title: Practice-Based Online/Remote Learning Design Workshop: Application to Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning platforms, secondary-level or higher mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment emphasizing hands-on design activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply the Learning Design Framework to design practice-based activities for a mathematics module within four weeks.
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of designed modules with over 80% accuracy using Learning Analytics Tools.
Learners can create visualizations of mathematical concepts using various digital devices (tablet PCs, interactive whiteboards).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
